info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:23PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Mineral County through 500 PM MDT... At 423 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tarkio, or 12 miles southeast of Superior, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in difficult driving conditions along Interstate 90 near Tarkio. Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Riverbend, Quartz and Lozeau. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 52 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
